channel.title: Reading on Junbin Huang
channel.description: Recent content in Reading on Junbin Huang

item.title: Recently Read Papers
item.description: I create this page to write down some notes and reflection about the research paper/blog I have read. Here are some of the most useful ones gathering from the recent project I am working on. They are separated by topics and projects. Some of the titles are followed by my brief comment which describe the mainly reason I choose them to put down here. The Emotion Recognition Zheng W L, Lu B L.
